attributes.action: Conduct a Review of the Isle of Wight Council's Proposals to close 23 Primary Schools on the Island
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Isle of Wight Council propose to radically alter the education system on the Island.  This involves closing 50% of its primary schools and requiring children aged as young as four to attend "super primaries" several miles from home with over 500 other pupils.
